It should be noted that with current advancements in the nanofabrication
166 and combination of LSPR with microfluidics,
167 further enhancement of sensitivity and potential integration in portable formats is feasible.
168, 169 Therefore, LSPR holds a great potential to improve the diagnostic accuracy in the clinical tests and relieve the pressure on PCR-based tests that usually need a well-equipped laboratory and well-trained personnel, which usually remains challenging due to a shortage of resources during pandemics.
